scripts.start:lib:protoc-gen-ng: nodemon --watch packages/protoc-gen-ng/src --watch packages/protoc-gen-ng/test/proto -e ts,proto --exec 'npm run build:lib:protoc-gen-ng && npm run test:lib:protoc-gen-ng:generate && npm run test:lib:protoc-gen-ng:generate-grpc-web && echo "Done"'
scripts.build:lib: run-s build:lib:common build:lib:core build:lib:grpc-web-client build:lib:improbable-eng-grpc-web-client build:lib:worker build:lib:worker-client build:lib:protoc-gen-ng build:lib:well-known-types
scripts.build:lib:core: ng build core --configuration production && cpy LICENSE.md dist/core/
scripts.build:lib:common: ng build common --configuration production && cpy LICENSE.md dist/common/
scripts.build:lib:grpc-web-client: ng build grpc-web-client --configuration production && cpy LICENSE.md dist/grpc-web-client/
scripts.build:lib:improbable-eng-grpc-web-client: ng build improbable-eng-grpc-web-client --configuration production && cpy LICENSE.md dist/improbable-eng-grpc-web-client/
scripts.build:lib:worker: ng build worker --configuration production && cpy LICENSE.md dist/worker/
scripts.build:lib:worker-client: ng build worker-client --configuration production && cpy LICENSE.md dist/worker-client/
scripts.build:lib:protoc-gen-ng: cd packages/protoc-gen-ng && rimraf ../../dist/protoc-gen-ng && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && chmod +x ../../dist/protoc-gen-ng/main.js && cpy package.json ../../dist/protoc-gen-ng/ && cpy ../../LICENSE.md ../../dist/protoc-gen-ng/ && cpy README.md ../../dist/protoc-gen-ng/
scripts.build:lib:well-known-types: ng build well-known-types --configuration production && cpy LICENSE.md dist/well-known-types/
scripts.test:lib: run-s test:lib:common test:lib:core test:lib:worker test:lib:worker-client test:lib:protoc-gen-ng
scripts.test:lib:protoc-gen-ng:generate: cd packages/protoc-gen-ng && mkdir -p ./test/out && rimraf ./test/out/* && $(pwd)/../../node_modules/.bin/grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ng=$(pwd)/../../dist/protoc-gen-ng/main.js --ng_out=config=./ngx-grpc.conf.js:./test/out -I test/proto $(find test/proto -iname "*.proto")
scripts.examples:backend: docker-compose -f examples/backend/docker-compose.yaml down && docker-compose -f examples/backend/docker-compose.yaml up --remove-orphans --build
scripts.examples:proto:generate-basic: mkdir -p examples/basic-example/src/proto && rm -rf examples/basic-example/src/proto/* && $(pwd)/node_modules/.bin/grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ng=$(pwd)/dist/protoc-gen-ng/main.js --ng_out=config=examples/basic-example/ngx-grpc.conf.js:examples/basic-example/src/proto -I examples/proto $(find examples/proto -iname "*.proto")
